mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users ( username, password, name, email, phone, parent_phone, age, gender, role, provider, provider_id, membership_tier, total_point, level, exp, profile_image, current_streak, last_study_date, created_at ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{parentPhone}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{role}, #{provider}, #{providerId}, #{membershipTier}, #{totalPoint}, #{level}, #{exp}, #{profileImage}, 0, NULL, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET total_point = #{totalPoint}, membership_tier = #{membershipTier}, level = #{level}, exp = #{exp}, current_streak = #{currentStreak}, last_study_date = #{lastStudyDate}, rival_id = #{rivalId}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM users WHERE name=#{name} AND email=#{email} AND phone=#{phone}
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username=#{username} AND email=#{email}
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET password = #{password}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE users SET phone = #{phone}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE users u JOIN study_plans p ON u.id = p.user_id SET u.total_point = u.total_point + #{point} WHERE p.id = #{planId}
